comment: I loved having her! She is super nice and caring, has a good sense of humor and is super well-versed in the material. Her classes are fun and interactive while also being informative. Material isn't hard, just do the work and you'll be fine. She is also very willing to help you with anything. Just ask! I definitely recommend her.

She was great! I'm excited to be taking another class of hers next semester. Her lectures are long, but full of good information. The tests don't include things that weren't covered and most of what you learn is applicable to finding a career. The exercises are interesting and there's extra credit. Very kind and genuinely wanted to help me.
She's a good one!! The assignment spread out is very clear and easy. Just don't get behind cause it'll be a pain to catch up. She's here to help you!! Very easy workload.

I genuinely don't know how this professor has 5 star reviews, maybe those reviews were in-person classes. I have heard that her in-person class was great, but I do not recommend her online class. She was so unorganized, none of her assignments and due dates matched up, and I felt like it was always a guessing game on what was due.

Professor Bethard-Caplick is a very knowledgeable PR professional, teacher, and advisor who really cares about her students. She wants people to get excited over public relations and wants everyone to succeed. Her class is easy but you learn a lot, and she gives good feedback. I definitely recommend taking her classes!

Attendance mandatory but she is honestly adorable and cracks me up with her sarcastic humor. It is her first year at KSU though so maybe she is just trying to make a good first impression. I liked her a lot.

Professor Caplick is an exceptional instructor. I took her for PR Writing and PR Cases but it wouldnt let me clarify that on ratemyprofessor. She is very easy to work with and genuinely cares about her students. Her lectures are interesting and she makes participation fun. If you are in PR you will thoroughly enjoy taking her courses.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Such a great professor! She worked as a PR professional during her career so she's very knowledgeable and I've learned a lot. She doesn't just have slides, but she also talks with us and highly encourages participation. EVERY class, we were given an opportunity for extra credit and she provides study guides for quizzes that were open-note!
